title: Hero Live Game
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in and wants to see most up to date game information on the featured game
custom_steps:
WHEN user is browsing the MLB.tv homepage
AND IF the Hero features a live game
custom_expected:
THEN

There is a "watch live" button

And display the following data:

Scores
Game Score
Current inning or
Outs
Count

title: Hero Upcoming Game
custom_preconds:
Given user is logged in
AND no games have started for the day

If no games have started for the day
custom_steps: When user views homepage and the Hero features an upcoming game
custom_expected:
THen show preview button
AND preview button links to gameday preview
AND show:

Show game start time with in ET timezone
Record
Scores
Basepath, outs, and count

title: Hero Archive Game
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user views an archived game (game that has ended plus 90 mins)
custom_expected: THEN show following buttons: Watch Archive and Watch Recap

title: Game pitcher batter matchup
custom_preconds: As a .TV subscriber, I want to see the pitcher/batter matchup on the featured game so that I can decide if the players make the game interesting enough to watch.
custom_expected:
Acceptance Criteria
For the selected hero game, show

Pitcher

Batter info

If game is live, show

Live game

Current pitcher info

Current batter info

Upcoming game 

Scheduled pitcher info

First batter info

Hide spoilers: “ON” - don’t display

Current pitcher info

Current batter info

Current Designs
https://mlb.invisionapp.com/freehand/document/WmBAwm0L (v3)

title: Hero game should not show in the upcoming game tiles
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user views the homepage
custom_expected: THEN the hero game should not show in the game tile carousels

title: Live Game Tile
custom_preconds: Given user is logged in and wants to see game details for a live game
custom_steps: When user lands on the homepage
custom_expected:
Then user should see the following:

Match up teams and logos
Team background colors
Scores 
Game State and inning
Bases / Outs
Pitcher info and team (last name only)
Hitter info and team

Special Alert tag (if available. Eg. Perfect game, No hitter) - Ignore for applause

When you click on the game tile, it should link to the playback page with a default feed selection. - Ignore for Applause

The data should be aligned as shown in the designs

Note that Blackout/ Live audio tags are handled later and out of scope for this ticket.

Designs:
https://app.zeplin.io/project/5ecfc65f721ad446afbaab09/screen/5ef64b6a321bc12921bed983

title: Hover Game tile
custom_preconds: Given user is a logged in and wants to see hover info for a game
custom_steps: When user looks at a game tile in hover state
custom_expected:
THEN the game tile should additionally show

Team’s W-L record
Player Headshots
Player’s in-game and season stats
All feed links
The tile gets bigger on Hover to accommodate the extra info.
The footer section of the tile should not be clickable unless you select one of the clickable links.
Should animate 

https://app.zeplin.io/project/5ecfc65f721ad446afbaab09/screen/5ef64b6a321bc12921bed983

title: Game Tile Live Updates* - game cards
custom_preconds: Given user is logged in and wants to see most upto date information about a live game on .tv homepage
custom_steps: When user views game tile with live updates
custom_expected:
THEN all of the following info on the game tile should update live as the game progresses

Scores 
Game State and inning
Bases / Outs
Pitcher info, team and in-game stats
Hitter info, team and in-game stats
Special Alert tag (if available. Eg. Perfect game, No hitter)
Player headshots (hover state)

When an upcoming game goes live, the game tile should switch to live mode (separate test case?)

When a live game tile is complete, it should switch to archive mode. (separate test case?)

Designs
https://app.zeplin.io/project/5ecfc65f721ad446afbaab09/screen/5ef64b6a321bc12921bed983

title: Upcoming game tile
custom_preconds: Given user is logged in and wants to see details for an upcoming game
custom_steps: When user views a game tile for an upcoming game
custom_expected:
Then the homepage will populate the game tile with:

Match up teams and logos
Team background colors
the “@” symbol in place of Scores 
The game time is EST in place of Game State and inning
Probable pitchers for each team
Temp Status if available??
Special Game alert if available??

On Hover state, also populate
Team record
Pitcher record and ERA
Player headshots
Feed links if available (unclickable until Media = ON)??

When you click on the game tile, it should link to the preview for that game on another tab. (just check that the tab opens with preview)

The data should be aligned as shown in the designs

Note that Blackout/ Live audio tags are handled later and out of scope for this ticket.

Designs:
Web Game tile anatomy - https://app.zeplin.io/project/5ecfc65f721ad446afbaab09/screen/5ef64b6a321bc12921bed983

CD - All game card states - https://app.zeplin.io/project/5eece94ce9c53d2aacfc60e6/screen/5ef1f022a852bb27fd5555cb

title: Archive game tile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in and wants to see completed game details
AND game must have ended (plus 90 mins after ending)
custom_steps: WHEN the user views a game tile for one that is completed and archived state
custom_expected:
THEN populate the game tile with:

Match up teams and logos
Team background colors
Final Scores 
Final Game State and extra inning
WLS Player names
Grayed out bases/outs icons
Temp Status if available
Special Game alert if available

On Hover state, also populate
Team record

Player stats

Player headshots

Feed links if available

Link to Highlights and recaps

When you click on the game tile, it should link to the archive for that game on another tab.

The data should be aligned as shown in the designs

Note that Blackout/ Live audio tags are handled later and out of scope for this ticket.

Designs
Web Game tile anatomy - https://app.zeplin.io/project/5ecfc65f721ad446afbaab09/screen/5ef64b6a321bc12921bed983

CD - All game card states - https://app.zeplin.io/project/5eece94ce9c53d2aacfc60e6/screen/5ef1f022a852bb27fd5555cb

title: Game Tile - Carousel Behavior
custom_preconds: Given user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user views the game tile carousel
custom_expected:
THEN:

The carousel has arrows on both ends to navigate tiles
The carousel arrow should only show if there are more items to navigate to in either direction
The carousel should update all items visible with each click
No infinite loop on the carousels

title: Game Tile -  Clicking on Upcoming game
custom_preconds: Given user is logged in
custom_steps: When user clicks on the upcoming game tile
custom_expected:
THEN it should link to the preview for that game on another tab.
The data should be aligned as shown in the designs
Note that Blackout/ Live audio tags are handled later and out of scope for this ticket.

title: VOD Hover State*
custom_preconds: Given user is a subscriber
custom_steps: WHEN user hovers over a video to see the full description
custom_expected:
THEN user can see the full description of the video (max 140 characters in forge).

There is animation effect on the video tile hover effect

Removing the cursor from hover state will return the tile to normal size

The hover state may overlap or cover neighboring videos which is fine.

Designs
https://mlb.invisionapp.com/freehand/document/29pD1jNr9 (Highfi 03 - Hover state on VOD)

title: Carousel Styling and Behavior
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEn user views the carouusel
custom_expected:
THEN
The carousel has arrows on both ends to navigate tiles

The carousel arrow should only show if there are more items to navigate to in either direction

The carousel should update all items visible with each click

Start with the default animation transition effect

No infinite loop on the carousels

title: Redirect - Logged out
custom_preconds: Given user is logged out
custom_steps: When a user navigates to https://beta-gcp.mlb.com/tv/welcome-center
custom_expected:
THEN user is directed to the login page
AND on logging in, user is directed to the welcome center/homepage

title: Verify custom header (APPLAUSE DO NOT TEST)
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user views the top nav
custom_expected:
THEN
user sees navigation bar with the following options aligned left

:MLB.TV Logo > Goes to live-stream-games (dev: works in the sample page, but not locally)

:MLB.TV Home > Also goes to live-stream-games

:Games > Goes to live-stream-games/schedule

:Clips >Goes to mlb.com/video

:Shows > Goes to our SVOD playback page

:MLB Network > Goes to mlb.com/network/live

title: Verify that the page you are on has an underline
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user views the page tab
custom_expected: THEN user sees an underline for the current page they are on

title: Verify the contents of the nav
custom_preconds:
SUBJECT TO CHANGE DEPENDING ON WHERE WE ARE IN THE SEASON

GIVEN user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user views the nav
custom_expected:
MLB.TV HOME
GAMES
SHOWS


On the right side
Upgrade > Help > Current Subscribers > Account

title: Verify Dropdown appears when user mouses to "Account" in top nav
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user hovers over "Account"
custom_expected:
THEN user should see dropdown menu appear containing the following: 

Account Settings 
My Teams
Manage Subscriptions
Email Newsletters
Sign Out

title: Verify Failed Log in
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is not logged in
AND user is on login page
custom_steps: WHEN incorrect credentials are entered
custom_expected: THEN authentication error occurs.

title: Free users
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a free user
AND there is a game live/coming up
custom_steps: WHEN user views the featured game and carousel
custom_expected:
THEN user should see a lock icon on "Preview" or "watch" button
AND user shold see lock screen on the game tile

title: Audio Users
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has an audio only account
AND there is a live/upcoming game
custom_steps: WHEN user logs in with audio account
custom_expected: THEN user can only see the audio feed links, no lock icons

title: Lock icon features
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in as a free user
AND there is a live or upcoming game
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks on the locked "watch button"
AND user clicks on a locked game tile
custom_expected: THEN user should be redirected to sell page

title: Single team entitlement
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has a single team subscription
custom_steps: WHEN user logs in
custom_expected: THEN they can only see game content for their team

title: All game entitlement
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in with an all game entitlements
custom_steps: WHEN user logs in
custom_expected: THEN user can see all games and content (though they may be blacked out)

title: Users favorite team populates the live/archive games in the front
Live Video Playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in with correct entitlements
AND navigates to live video feed on MLB.TV playback page
custom_steps: WHEN video playback is initiated
custom_expected:
THEN progress bar is located at the far right of the progress bar
AND live button is available 
AND the Live button shows the active live state (RED)

title: Archive video playback
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is logged in with correct entitlements
AND navigates to archive video feed on MLB.TV playback page
custom_steps: WHEN video playback is initiated
custom_expected:
THEN progress bar shows its position on far left position of the bar
AND Live button is not available
